en.title: Achiever Recognition Dinner, Jakarta, 29th August 2008 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achiever Recognition Dinner, Jakarta, at the Hailal International Club, 29th August 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with many quality leaders, VIPs and invited guests. There were nine Presidential Directors attending from Malaysia supporting their teams in Indonesia. Indonesia is a HUGE market and FE will be spending a lot of resources to help FE leaders build their business in Indonesia.

At the Event, FE is proud to announce the appointment of Mr Ade Rai, Champion World Class Indonesian Bodybuilder and Celebrity, as one of FE's Spokesmen in Indonesia. Mr Ade Rai brings credibility and prestige to FE and his Testimonial speech endorsing FE's Quantum Pendant was very well received by the audience. Mr Ade Rai's celebrity status in Indonesia was well evidenced throughout the night by the numerous requests for photos to be taken with him! FE is honoured to have a Spokesman of Ade Rai's caliber joining our Team! FE will be announcing the appointments of more prominent Indonesian Spokesmen in the coming week.

Highlights of the Event Include:

- Entertainment by Pink Entertainment Band and Hailal Dance Troupe.

- Appearance by Heintje Pojoh, Champion Indonesian Bantam Weight Bodybuilder (2000 - 2008).

- Welcome Speech by Patrick Widjaja, Indonesia Country Licensee.

- Speech by FE CEO Paul Ting.

- Recognition of Presidential Directors on Stage.

- Sharing by Presidential Director, KC Phoon, who as usual gave a Highly Motivating Speech.Thank you, KC!

- Dr Amir Farid's Talk on Scalar Energy which was very Informative to the Audience.

- Sponsorship of FE's Quantum Pendant to the Indonesian National Baseball Team.

- Thank You Speech by Luqman Hakim, Coach of the Indonesian National Baseball Team, who also shared his Testimonial on FE's Quantum Pendant.

- Sharing of Testimonial by Putty Insavilla, Indonesian Woman Bowling Champion.

- Introduction of Indonesian Spokesman, Ade Rai who gave a great Speech and Testimonial on FE's Quantum Pendant. Welcome to the FE family, Ade!

- Testimonial and Product Demonstrations by FE Spokesman, International Long Drive Golf Specialist, Jean Daniels.

- Lifting Demonstration by Presidential Director , KC Phoon. This demo, without fail, always received the loudest applause from the audience!

- Recognition of New Indonesian Directors.

- Donation of RM 10,000.00 to SAJA (Sekolah Anak Jalanan or School for Street Kids). FE is so glad we can contribute to help provide education to these kids, something we take for granted. We hope FE's successful leaders will follow suit to help the less fortunate of society and make this world a better place for all!

- Lucky Draws.

- Closing Speech by Patrick Widjaja.

Thank you, Patrick Widjaja (Indonesia Country Licensee) , Praba Ramadass and Irene Mongkar for organizing yet another Successful Event! Thank you also to Anowar JM for doing a wonderful job as MC for the night!

We look forward to the next Indonesian event on Saturday, 11th October 2008, to be held at the same venue, Hailal International Club! SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!
< Click here for more photos >
